snippet.title: Kami no Machi (神の聖都) for the NEC PC-88
snippet.description:
Came also out for:

FM-7
MSX2
PC-98



Game description:

At 8 pm. On August 8, 1990, a sudden catastrophe occurred in a limited area of Kannai, Yokohama, this event turned the place into a lawless area. The area became known as "Agarta" and was forgotten. Two years later, a young man, Yuki heads to Agarta to find Yukari, his crush, who disappeared during the cataclysm.

Kami no Machi is a Japanese-style adventure game. The player talks to people, asks questions, inspects objects and goes from one place to another.
